name: Elf Saves Christmas
description:
I set myself a challenge early December to try and make a complete game and release it before Christmas, with my deadline being December 24th (Christmas Eve).

This is the end of result of roughly 2.5 weeks of work, using a couple hours most evenings.

The game is missing some obvious polish, such as the lack of any audio outside of a short, looping jingle, and there may be a couple bugs, but all-in-all I'm happy with the result.

Completing this challenge helped show me what I'm capable of making given a tight deadline, and that perfect code etc. isn't a "must" to put something playable together. 

I'd appreciate any feedback/bug reports etc. in the comments :)

I hope you all enjoy the game, and Merry Christmas!
